subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: Argentina eliminated Sweden from the Davis Cup behind David Nalbandian’s five-set victory over Robin Soderling on a windy day on clay in Buenos Aires, setting up a semifinal against Russia. Nalbandian won, 6-4, 1-6, 4-6, 6-4, 9-7, in 4 hours 15 minutes in the first reverse singles, giving Argentina an insurmountable 3-1 lead.
